summary: An email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York requesting scans of all interview notes and any available FBI 302s since Jeffrey Epstein's arrest, to assist in briefing supervisors on case issues.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: The sender of the email requesting interview notes and FBI 302s related to the Epstein case to brief supervisors.

events.title: Epstein's Arrest
events.description: Reference to the arrest of Jeffrey Epstein, which prompted the collection of interview notes and FBI 302s.

keyFacts: The email is a request from a federal prosecutor for investigative materials related to Jeffrey Epstein's case.
The request specifically asks for all interview notes and any available FBI 302s generated since Epstein's arrest.
The purpose is to brief supervisors on a series of issues within the case.
The correspondence indicates ongoing investigative and prosecutorial work following Epstein's arrest in 2019.
